Posts.Content: Got a call from the imaging center yesterday to come for more pictures today. I have a dense spot in left breast. After reading posts on this forum I feel better this morning, I was worried sick all night ! It is amazing how your mind takes over with negative thoughts. Will find out today what is going on. Thanks for listening.
Posts.Title: Call back mammogram Worried

Posts.Content: Biopsy went well . I   have a  large hematoma, but it is doing OK.   I just got the results .. benign!
Posts.Title: Call back mammogram Worried

Posts.Content:
They did find something about
 1 cm. Will have a biopsy next week to tell what it is. I am OK with it , abit scared , but I can't keep making myself sick with worry. It could be weeks before I find out, and if it is cancer I will have to deal with it. Easier said then done.
Thanks for your reply it really help to "talk" about
 it
Kathy
Posts.Title: Call back mammogram Worried
